You're in my spot.

Beside are will still on for a battle when I am more available?

Yes. I'm constantly building and improving ships, but I think mine are kind of just good-looking crap.

...you do realize that ship is 4 times as big as an E-Class. Which could probably kill the Rapture.

I love how you and FallingIntoBlack are both building 200+ ton ships, as a direct result of my E-Class (85 tons). dat logic.

I only built the Vindicator-Class because I wanted to see if I could make a good combat ship. Also, you do realize that the Vindicator-Class is complete. Edits may be made to it in the future, but the ship itself is already built.

This is going to be an abomination isn't it

Yes, abomination is the right word.

I shall never speak of this "unnamed" ship ever again. is that clear?

Combination of Derk and E.

Got all their weaknesses didn't it

Here's a shot of a test fire of a Vindicator-Class Cruiser "variant."

Apparently the Vindicator "variant" had a "problem" with its missiles.

If you look closely at that picture, a gash can be seen in the hull...but the picture below shows the aftermath of the missile incident, as well as what's left of it after a plane crashed into the side of it.

Before I flew an SR-49 Electric Eye into the side of it, there was a gash in the hull, as can be seen in the first picture...all the struts that I attached to it pulled it back together after the Electric Eye hit it and destroyed the missiles lodged in the gash in the hull. Oddly enough, everything except its missiles, which were fired all at once, along with its Helios Torpedoes, which were also fired, survived the incident.

Edited October 7, 2013 by FallingIntoBlack

As promised here is a test run of the Rapture

For this test I decided to use the weaker SRB missiles

Shot Fired

And hit

This is all that remains

So as you can see, even though the Rapture Class Dreadnaught is not as armored as the e-class, she can be extremely devastating

She can be extremely devastating, that is, if she doesn't get destroyed before she can do any real damage.

I even was able to take out an e-class with it from 2km away (didn't take pics because i didn't think i could hit it and I haven't been able to repeat the shot sense)

1 shot of the Judgement cannon

and 10 SRB missiles

so yeah its over kill
